config.name: Payplan - Bundle
config.author: Morris Media Network
config.description: Bundle was designed to integrate with payplans to allow to extend the subscription plans. It will allow for fields to be attached to the subscription plans that will directly affect the price; Such as additional options to the subscriptions that increase the price of the subscription.

param.name: child_name
param.label: Child Name
param.description: The additional price each child will add to a plan

param.name: adult_name
param.label: Adult Price
param.description: The additional price each Adult will add to a plan
